message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am proposing a price of $13,500 for the product. This is a special offer considering its value to you is $15,000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm definitely interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider a price closer to $11,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your feedback, I am willing to adjust the price to $12,000. This still reflects the value of the product while being more accessible to your budget. Please let me know if this works for you.
Hello again Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. $12,000 is closer, but I'm still aiming for something a little lower.  Could we meet in the middle at $11,500?

I understand your position, Bob. In light of our previous discussions, I am willing to consider $11,750 as the final price for the product. This is the highest I can go, given its value and my other business considerations. I hope this meets your expectations.
